---
title: "Data Quality Framework"
---

## What is Data Quality?
High-quality clinical data is:
- Accurate
- Complete
- Timely
- Consistent
- Traceable to source

## CRA Data Quality Domains
- Data entry (EDC)
- Source documentation
- Query management
- Protocol adherence
- Safety reporting

## Inspection Reality
Inspectors assess not just errors,
but whether the **data quality system itself is effective.**
